form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

form.official-title: To impose limits on excepting competitive service positions from the competitive service, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Preventing a Patronage System Act of 2021 or the PPSA Act of 2021.

section.header: Limitations on exception of competitive service positions

subsection.text: No position in the competitive service (as defined under section 2102 of title 5, United States Code) may be excepted from the competitive service unless such position is placedâ€”

paragraph.text: in any of the schedules A through E as described in section 6.2 of title 5, Code of Federal Regulations, as in effect on September 30, 2020; and
under the terms and conditions under part 6 of such title as in effect on such date.

subsection.text: No position in the excepted service (as defined under section 2103 of title 5, United States Code) may be placed in any schedule other than a schedule described in subsection (a)(1).

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives September 15, 2022.
